languages.text: {n}Налившийся краской от злобы и стыда, сенешаль рявкает:{/n} "Довольно. Лейтенант — на выход. Мы обсудим и назревающий бунт, и ваше недостойное офицера поведение".

{n}Flushed with anger and embarrassment, the Seneschal bellows,{/n} "Enough! Lieutenant, you know where the exit is. You and I will discuss the brewing rebellion, as well as your egregious breach of protocol here today."
languages.original_text: {n}Налившийся краской от злобы и стыда, сенешаль рявкает:{/n} "Довольно. Лейтенант — на выход. Мы обсудим и назревающий бунт, и ваше недостойное офицера поведение".

{n}Flushed with anger and embarrassment, the Seneschal bellows,{/n} "Enough! Lieutenant, you know where the exit is. You and I will discuss the brewing rebellion, as well as your egregious breach of protocol here today."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德既恼怒、又窘迫，他涨红了脸，高声喊道。{/n}“够了！中尉，你清楚出口在什么地方。我会和你讨论一下这场正在酝酿的叛乱，以及你今天违反军官守则的恶劣行为。”
languages.original_text: {n}Flushed with anger and embarrassment, the Seneschal bellows,{/n} "Enough! Lieutenant, you know where the exit is. You and I will discuss the brewing rebellion, as well as your egregious breach of protocol here today."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德既恼怒、又窘迫，他涨红了脸，高声喊道。{/n}“够了！中尉，你清楚出口在什么地方。我会和你讨论一下这场正在酝酿的叛乱，以及你今天违反军官守则的恶劣行为。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Rubicundo por la ira y la vergüenza, el Senescal brama:{/n} «¡Basta! Teniente, ya sabe dónde está la salida. Ya hablaremos de la rebelión que se prepara y de su flagrante infracción del protocolo».
languages.original_text: {n}Flushed with anger and embarrassment, the Seneschal bellows,{/n} "Enough! Lieutenant, you know where the exit is. You and I will discuss the brewing rebellion, as well as your egregious breach of protocol here today."

traits.locale_text: {n}Rubicundo por la ira y la vergüenza, el Senescal brama:{/n} «¡Basta! Teniente, ya sabe dónde está la salida. Ya hablaremos de la rebelión que se prepara y de su flagrante infracción del protocolo».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}怒りと恥ずかしさで顔を赤らめた家令長は、大声で叫んだ。{/n}「もういい、少尉！出口はわかっているな。反乱の醸成と…今日のお前の違反行為について話し合おう」
languages.original_text: {n}Flushed with anger and embarrassment, the Seneschal bellows,{/n} "Enough! Lieutenant, you know where the exit is. You and I will discuss the brewing rebellion, as well as your egregious breach of protocol here today."

traits.locale_text: {n}怒りと恥ずかしさで顔を赤らめた家令長は、大声で叫んだ。{/n}「もういい、少尉！出口はわかっているな。反乱の醸成と…今日のお前の違反行為について話し合おう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Truchsess bellt wütend und beschämt:{/n} "Schluss damit! Lieutenant, Ihr wisst, wo der Ausgang ist. Wir beide werden die brodelnde Rebellion sowie Euren eklatanten Verstoß gegen jedes Protokoll besprechen."
languages.original_text: {n}Flushed with anger and embarrassment, the Seneschal bellows,{/n} "Enough! Lieutenant, you know where the exit is. You and I will discuss the brewing rebellion, as well as your egregious breach of protocol here today."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Truchsess bellt wütend und beschämt:{/n} "Schluss damit! Lieutenant, Ihr wisst, wo der Ausgang ist. Wir beide werden die brodelnde Rebellion sowie Euren eklatanten Verstoß gegen jedes Protokoll besprechen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Partagé entre la colère et la honte, le sénéchal s'exclame :{/n} « Assez ! Lieutenante, vous pouvez disposer. Nous en reparlerons, vous et moi. Et pas seulement de la rébellion qui gronde, mais aussi de votre insubordination caractérisée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Flushed with anger and embarrassment, the Seneschal bellows,{/n} "Enough! Lieutenant, you know where the exit is. You and I will discuss the brewing rebellion, as well as your egregious breach of protocol here today."

traits.locale_text: {n}Partagé entre la colère et la honte, le sénéchal s'exclame :{/n} « Assez ! Lieutenante, vous pouvez disposer. Nous en reparlerons, vous et moi. Et pas seulement de la rébellion qui gronde, mais aussi de votre insubordination caractérisée. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Öfke ve mahcubiyetle kıpkırmızı kesilen Seneşal kükrüyor.{/n} "Yeter. Teğmen, kapının yerini bildiğinizi farz ediyorum. Patlak vermek üzere olan isyanı ve bugünkü protokol dışı davranışlarınızı konuşacağız."
languages.original_text: {n}Flushed with anger and embarrassment, the Seneschal bellows,{/n} "Enough! Lieutenant, you know where the exit is. You and I will discuss the brewing rebellion, as well as your egregious breach of protocol here today."
